data.text:
Spent an amazing three nights here for my birthday and wish it had been longer ðŸ˜Š
Beautiful well presented hotel. Lovely spacious rooms. The staff are amazing and very friendly especially Simo, who could not do enough for us. Even hauling our suitcases to Main Street to get us a taxi when the one we booked did not turn up.
Hotel is in a lovely quiet area but very central to everything. 
The rooftop pool and bar are a lovely addition .
Definitely deserves the great reviews and will be back ðŸ˜Š
data.title: Birthday Trip

data.text: We had a wonderful stay at the Hotel Catalunya Magdalenes. The hotel is conveniently located and close to Las Rumblas and Plaza de la Cataluyna. The rooms were elegantly decorated and spacious. Our doorman Adam was particularly helpful and even walked us 3 blocks to hail a taxi. Highly recommended.
data.title: Very helpful and enthusiastic staffs

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Alimouse88
thank you very much for sharing with us your experience and your kind words.
My colleague Adam is today grateful for your message, not always a customer recognizes a good work and it says a lot of your human greatness.
We are glad to know that you enjoyed our hotel and that you recommend our work.
Hope to welcome you back very soon, best regards,
Marta Alamany
GM Hotel Catalonia Magdalenes****
owner_response.author: Marta Alamany

data.text:
We spent a wonderful 3 days at this hotel. Our room was spacious and very comfortable, the rooftop swimming pool was lovely (if a little bracing at this time of year), breakfast was great - lots of choice, omelet station, array of bread, cereal, cheese and meat, mini bar was reasonably priced, as was the rooftop bar and everywhere was spotlessly clean. 

The best feature however were the staff. The reception team were great - Adrian was so helpful and polite, Simo provided great recommendations on where to go and restaurants to try and Aida was  so accommodating and professional. All the staff that we met were lovely from the breakfast team, the bar staff and the housekeeper. We would definitely stay again.
data.title: Great hotel in wonderfully historic location with the nicest staff

data.text: This hotel is a very good four star hotel. The main positives are the friendliness of the staff and its efficiency. The staff are excellent from the reception to the  breakfast staff to the room servicing. It is clean and very comfortable. The breakfast is excellent. The pool on the roof and the outside seating there are great with a fantastic view of the cathedral. The location of the Hotel Catalonia is great once one has figured out the shortest route to the Placa de Catalunya by the narrow streets. I recommend it strongly.
data.title: Freindly and efficient hotel that is to be recommended
